00045 const char CellStoreV0::DATA_BLOCK_MAGIC[10]           =
00046     { 'D','a','t','a','-','-','-','-','-','-' };
00047 const char CellStoreV0::INDEX_FIXED_BLOCK_MAGIC[10]    =
00048     { 'I','d','x','F','i','x','-','-','-','-' };
00049 const char CellStoreV0::INDEX_VARIABLE_BLOCK_MAGIC[10] =
00050     { 'I','d','x','V','a','r','-','-','-','-' };

00053   const uint32_t MAX_APPENDS_OUTSTANDING = 3;

00056 CellStoreV0::CellStoreV0(Filesystem *filesys)
00057   : m_filesys(filesys), m_filename(), m_fd(-1), m_compressor(0), m_buffer(0),
00058     m_fix_index_buffer(0), m_var_index_buffer(0), m_memory_consumed(0),
00059     m_outstanding_appends(0), m_offset(0), m_last_key(0), m_file_length(0),
00060     m_disk_usage(0), m_file_id(0), m_uncompressed_blocksize(0) {
00061   m_file_id = FileBlockCache::get_next_file_id();
00062   assert(sizeof(float) == 4);
00063 }

00066 
00067 CellStoreV0::~CellStoreV0() {
00068   try {
00069     delete m_compressor;
00070 
00071     if (m_fd != -1)
00072       m_filesys->close(m_fd);
00073   }
00074   catch (Exception &e) {
00075     HT_ERROR_OUT << "Error closing DFS client: "<< e << HT_END;
00076   }
00077   if (m_memory_consumed)
00078     Global::memory_tracker.subtract(m_memory_consumed);
00079 }

00082 BlockCompressionCodec *CellStoreV0::create_block_compression_codec() {

00084       (BlockCompressionCodec::Type)m_trailer.compression_type);

00094 const char *CellStoreV0::get_split_row() {

00096     return m_split_row.c_str();
00097   return 0;

00107 int
00108 CellStoreV0::create(const char *fname, uint32_t blocksize,
00109                     const std::string &compressor) {
00110   m_buffer.reserve(blocksize*4);
00111 
00112   m_fd = -1;
00113   m_offset = 0;
00114   m_last_key = 0;
00115   m_fix_index_buffer.reserve(blocksize);
00116   m_var_index_buffer.reserve(blocksize);
00117 
00118   m_uncompressed_data = 0.0;
00119   m_compressed_data = 0.0;
00120 
00121   m_trailer.clear();
00122   m_trailer.blocksize = blocksize;
00123   m_uncompressed_blocksize = blocksize;
00124 
00125   m_filename = fname;
00126 
00127   m_start_row = "";
00128   m_end_row = Key::END_ROW_MARKER;
00129 
00130   if (compressor.empty())
00131     m_trailer.compression_type = CompressorFactory::parse_block_codec_spec(
00132         "lzo", m_compressor_args);
00133   else
00134     m_trailer.compression_type = CompressorFactory::parse_block_codec_spec(
00135         compressor, m_compressor_args);
00136 
00137   m_compressor = CompressorFactory::create_block_codec(
00138       (BlockCompressionCodec::Type)m_trailer.compression_type,
00139       m_compressor_args);
00140 
00141   try { m_fd = m_filesys->create(m_filename, true, -1, -1, -1); }
00142   catch (Exception &e) {
00143     HT_ERRORF("Error creating cellstore: %s", e.what());
00144     return e.code();
00145   }
00146   return Error::OK;
00147 }

00149 
00150 int CellStoreV0::add(const Key &key, const ByteString value) {
00151   EventPtr event_ptr;
00152   DynamicBuffer zbuf;
00153 
00154   if (key.revision > m_trailer.revision)
00155     m_trailer.revision = key.revision;
00156 
00157   if (m_buffer.fill() > m_uncompressed_blocksize) {
00158     BlockCompressionHeader header(DATA_BLOCK_MAGIC);
00159 
00160     add_index_entry(m_last_key, m_offset);
00161 
00162     m_uncompressed_data += (float)m_buffer.fill();
00163     m_compressor->deflate(m_buffer, zbuf, header);
00164     m_compressed_data += (float)zbuf.fill();
00165     m_buffer.clear();
00166 
00167     uint64_t llval = ((uint64_t)m_trailer.blocksize
00168         * (uint64_t)m_uncompressed_data) / (uint64_t)m_compressed_data;
00169     m_uncompressed_blocksize = (uint32_t)llval;
00170 
00171     if (m_outstanding_appends >= MAX_APPENDS_OUTSTANDING) {
00172       if (!m_sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr)) {
00173         HT_ERRORF("Problem writing to DFS file '%s' : %s", m_filename.c_str(),
00174             Hypertable::Protocol::string_format_message(event_ptr).c_str());
00175         return -1;
00176       }
00177       m_outstanding_appends--;
00178     }
00179 
00180     size_t zlen = zbuf.fill();
00181     StaticBuffer send_buf(zbuf);
00182 
00183     try { m_filesys->append(m_fd, send_buf, 0, &m_sync_handler); }
00184     catch (Exception &e) {
00185       HT_ERRORF("Problem writing to DFS file '%s' : %s",
00186                 m_filename.c_str(), e.what());
00187       return -1;
00188     }
00189     m_outstanding_appends++;
00190     m_offset += zlen;
00191   }
00192 
00193   size_t value_len = value.length();
00194 
00195   m_buffer.ensure(key.length + value_len);
00196 
00197   m_last_key.ptr = m_buffer.add_unchecked(key.serial.ptr, key.length);
00198   m_buffer.add_unchecked(value.ptr, value_len);
00199 
00200   m_trailer.total_entries++;
00201 
00202   return 0;
00203 }

00206 
00207 int CellStoreV0::finalize() {
00208   EventPtr event_ptr;
00209   int error = -1;
00210   size_t zlen;
00211   DynamicBuffer zbuf(0);
00212   size_t len;
00213   uint8_t *base;
00214   SerializedKey key;
00215   StaticBuffer send_buf;
00216 
00217   if (m_buffer.fill() > 0) {
00218     BlockCompressionHeader header(DATA_BLOCK_MAGIC);
00219 
00220     add_index_entry(m_last_key, m_offset);
00221 
00222     m_uncompressed_data += (float)m_buffer.fill();
00223     m_compressor->deflate(m_buffer, zbuf, header);
00224     m_compressed_data += (float)zbuf.fill();
00225 
00226     zlen = zbuf.fill();
00227     send_buf = zbuf;
00228 
00229     if (m_outstanding_appends >= MAX_APPENDS_OUTSTANDING) {
00230       if (!m_sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr)) {
00231         HT_ERRORF("Problem writing to DFS file '%s' : %s", m_filename.c_str(),
00232                   Protocol::string_format_message(event_ptr).c_str());
00233         goto abort;
00234       }
00235       m_outstanding_appends--;
00236     }
00237 
00238     try { m_filesys->append(m_fd, send_buf, 0, &m_sync_handler); }
00239     catch (Exception &e) {
00240       HT_ERRORF("Problem writing to DFS file '%s' : %s", m_filename.c_str(),
00241                 e.what());
00242       goto abort;
00243     }
00244     m_outstanding_appends++;
00245     m_offset += zlen;
00246   }
00247 
00248   m_buffer.free();
00249 
00250   m_trailer.fix_index_offset = m_offset;
00251   if (m_uncompressed_data == 0)
00252     m_trailer.compression_ratio = 1.0;
00253   else
00254     m_trailer.compression_ratio = m_compressed_data / m_uncompressed_data;
00255   m_trailer.version = 0;
00256 
00260   base = m_fix_index_buffer.release(&len);
00261   m_fix_index_buffer.reserve(len);
00262   m_fix_index_buffer.add_unchecked(base, len);
00263   delete [] base;
00264   base = m_var_index_buffer.release(&len);
00265   m_var_index_buffer.reserve(len);
00266   m_var_index_buffer.add_unchecked(base, len);
00267   delete [] base;
00268 
00272   {
00273     BlockCompressionHeader header(INDEX_FIXED_BLOCK_MAGIC);
00274     m_compressor->deflate(m_fix_index_buffer, zbuf, header);
00275   }
00276 
00277   zlen = zbuf.fill();
00278   send_buf = zbuf;
00279 
00280   try { m_filesys->append(m_fd, send_buf, 0, &m_sync_handler); }
00281   catch (Exception &e) {
00282     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00283     goto abort;
00284   }
00285   m_outstanding_appends++;
00286   m_offset += zlen;
00287 
00291   {
00292     BlockCompressionHeader header(INDEX_VARIABLE_BLOCK_MAGIC);
00293     m_trailer.var_index_offset = m_offset;
00294     m_compressor->deflate(m_var_index_buffer, zbuf, header, m_trailer.size());
00295   }
00296 
00300   uint32_t offset;
00301   m_fix_index_buffer.ptr = m_fix_index_buffer.base;
00302   m_var_index_buffer.ptr = m_var_index_buffer.base;
00303   for (size_t i=0; i<m_trailer.index_entries; i++) {
00304     // variable portion
00305     key.ptr = m_var_index_buffer.ptr;
00306     m_var_index_buffer.ptr += key.length();
00307     // fixed portion (e.g. offset)
00308     memcpy(&offset, m_fix_index_buffer.ptr, sizeof(offset));
00309     m_fix_index_buffer.ptr += sizeof(offset);
00310     m_index.insert(m_index.end(), IndexMap::value_type(key, offset));
00311     if (i == m_trailer.index_entries/2) {
00312       record_split_row(m_var_index_buffer.ptr);
00313     }
00314   }
00315 
00316   // deallocate fix index data
00317   delete [] m_fix_index_buffer.release();
00318 
00319   // write filter_offset (empty for now)
00320   m_trailer.filter_offset = m_offset + zbuf.fill();
00321 
00322   //
00323   m_trailer.serialize(zbuf.ptr);
00324   zbuf.ptr += m_trailer.size();
00325 
00326   zlen = zbuf.fill();
00327   send_buf = zbuf;
00328 
00329   try { m_filesys->append(m_fd, send_buf); }
00330   catch (Exception &e) {
00331     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00332     goto abort;
00333   }
00334   m_outstanding_appends++;
00335   m_offset += zlen;
00336 
00338   try { m_filesys->close(m_fd); }
00339   catch (Exception &e) {
00340     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00341     goto abort;
00342   }
00343 
00345   m_file_length = m_offset;
00346 
00348   try { m_fd = m_filesys->open(m_filename); }
00349   catch (Exception &e) {
00350     HT_ERROR_OUT << "Error reopening cellstore: "<<  e << HT_END;
00351     goto abort;
00352   }
00353 
00354   m_disk_usage = (uint32_t)m_file_length;
00355   error = 0;
00356 
00357   m_memory_consumed = sizeof(CellStoreV0) + m_var_index_buffer.size
00358       + (m_index.size() * 2 * sizeof(IndexMap::value_type));
00359   Global::memory_tracker.add(m_memory_consumed);
00360 
00361  abort:
00362   delete m_compressor;
00363   m_compressor = 0;
00364 
00365   return error;
00366 }

00369 
00373 void CellStoreV0::add_index_entry(const SerializedKey key, uint32_t offset) {
00374 
00375   size_t key_len = key.length();
00376   m_var_index_buffer.ensure(key_len);
00377   memcpy(m_var_index_buffer.ptr, key.ptr, key_len);
00378   m_var_index_buffer.ptr += key_len;
00379 
00380   // Serialize offset into fix index buffer
00381   m_fix_index_buffer.ensure(sizeof(offset));
00382   memcpy(m_fix_index_buffer.ptr, &offset, sizeof(offset));
00383   m_fix_index_buffer.ptr += sizeof(offset);
00384 
00385   m_trailer.index_entries++;
00386 }

00389 
00393 int
00394 CellStoreV0::open(const char *fname, const char *start_row,
00395                   const char *end_row) {
00396   m_start_row = (start_row) ? start_row : "";
00397   m_end_row = (end_row) ? end_row : Key::END_ROW_MARKER;
00398 
00399   m_fd = -1;
00400 
00401   m_filename = fname;
00402 
00404   try { m_file_length = m_filesys->length(m_filename); }
00405   catch (Exception &e) {
00406     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00407     goto abort;
00408   }
00409 
00410   if (m_file_length < m_trailer.size()) {
00411     HT_ERRORF("Bad length of CellStore file '%s' - %llu", m_filename.c_str(),
00412               (Llu)m_file_length);
00413     goto abort;
00414   }
00415 
00417   try { m_fd =  m_filesys->open(m_filename); }
00418   catch (Exception &e) {
00419     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00420     goto abort;
00421   }
00422 
00426   {
00427     uint32_t len;
00428     uint8_t *trailer_buf = new uint8_t [m_trailer.size()];
00429 
00430     try {
00431       len = m_filesys->pread(m_fd, trailer_buf, m_trailer.size(),
00432                              m_file_length - m_trailer.size());
00433     }
00434     catch (Exception &e) {
00435       HT_ERRORF("Problem reading trailer for CellStore '%s': %s",
00436                 m_filename.c_str(), e.what());
00437       delete [] trailer_buf;
00438       goto abort;
00439     }
00440 
00441     if (len != m_trailer.size()) {
00442       HT_ERRORF("Problem reading trailer for CellStore file '%s' - only read "
00443                 "%u of %lu bytes", m_filename.c_str(), len, m_trailer.size());
00444       delete [] trailer_buf;
00445       goto abort;
00446     }
00447 
00448     m_trailer.deserialize(trailer_buf);
00449     delete [] trailer_buf;
00450   }
00451 
00453   if (m_trailer.version != 0) {
00454     HT_ERRORF("Unsupported CellStore version (%d) for file '%s'",
00455               m_trailer.version, fname);
00456     goto abort;
00457   }
00458   if (!(m_trailer.fix_index_offset < m_trailer.var_index_offset &&
00459         m_trailer.var_index_offset < m_file_length)) {
00460     HT_ERRORF("Bad index offsets in CellStore trailer fix=%u, var=%u, "
00461               "length=%llu, file='%s'", m_trailer.fix_index_offset,
00462               m_trailer.var_index_offset, (Llu)m_file_length, fname);
00463     goto abort;
00464   }
00465 
00466   return Error::OK;
00467 
00468  abort:
00469   return Error::LOCAL_IO_ERROR;
00470 }
00471 
00472 
00473 int CellStoreV0::load_index() {
00474   int error = -1;
00475   uint32_t amount, index_amount;
00476   uint8_t *fix_end;
00477   uint8_t *var_end;
00478   uint32_t len = 0;
00479   BlockCompressionHeader header;
00480   SerializedKey key;
00481   bool inflating_fixed=true;
00482 
00483   m_compressor = create_block_compression_codec();
00484 
00485   amount = index_amount = (m_file_length - m_trailer.size())
00486                           - m_trailer.fix_index_offset;
00487   try {
00488     DynamicBuffer buf(amount);
00489 
00491     len = m_filesys->pread(m_fd, buf.ptr, amount, m_trailer.fix_index_offset);
00492 
00493     if (len != amount)
00494       HT_THROWF(Error::DFSBROKER_IO_ERROR, "Error loading index for "
00495                 "CellStore '%s' : tried to read %d but only got %d",
00496                 m_filename.c_str(), amount, len);
00498     buf.ptr += (m_trailer.var_index_offset - m_trailer.fix_index_offset);
00499     m_compressor->inflate(buf, m_fix_index_buffer, header);
00500 
00501     inflating_fixed = false;
00502 
00503     if (!header.check_magic(INDEX_FIXED_BLOCK_MAGIC))
00504       HT_THROW(Error::BLOCK_COMPRESSOR_BAD_MAGIC, "");
00505 
00507     DynamicBuffer vbuf(0, false);
00508     amount = (m_file_length-m_trailer.size()) - m_trailer.var_index_offset;
00509     vbuf.base = buf.ptr;
00510     vbuf.ptr = buf.ptr + amount;
00511 
00512     m_compressor->inflate(vbuf, m_var_index_buffer, header);
00513 
00514     if (!header.check_magic(INDEX_VARIABLE_BLOCK_MAGIC))
00515       HT_THROW(Error::BLOCK_COMPRESSOR_BAD_MAGIC, "");
00516   }
00517   catch (Exception &e) {
00518     if (inflating_fixed)
00519       HT_ERROR_OUT <<"Error inflating FIXED index for cellstore '"
00520           << m_filename <<"': "<<  e << HT_END;
00521     else
00522       HT_ERROR_OUT <<"Error inflating VARIABLE index for cellstore '"
00523           << m_filename <<"': "<<  e << HT_END;
00524     HT_ERROR_OUT << "pread(fd=" << m_fd << ", len=" << len << ", amount="
00525         << index_amount << ")\n" << HT_END;
00526     HT_ERROR_OUT << m_trailer << HT_END;
00527     goto abort;
00528   }
00529 
00530   m_index.clear();
00531 
00532   uint32_t offset;
00533 
00534   // record end offsets for sanity checking and reset ptr
00535   fix_end = m_fix_index_buffer.ptr;
00536   m_fix_index_buffer.ptr = m_fix_index_buffer.base;
00537   var_end = m_var_index_buffer.ptr;
00538   m_var_index_buffer.ptr = m_var_index_buffer.base;
00539 
00540   for (size_t i=0; i< m_trailer.index_entries; i++) {
00541     assert(m_fix_index_buffer.ptr < fix_end);
00542     assert(m_var_index_buffer.ptr < var_end);
00543 
00544     // Deserialized cell key (variable portion)
00545     key.ptr = m_var_index_buffer.ptr;
00546     m_var_index_buffer.ptr += key.length();
00547 
00548     // Deserialize offset
00549     memcpy(&offset, m_fix_index_buffer.ptr, sizeof(offset));
00550     m_fix_index_buffer.ptr += sizeof(offset);
00551 
00552     m_index.insert(m_index.end(), IndexMap::value_type(key, offset));
00553   }
00554 
00558   {
00559     uint32_t start = 0;
00560     uint32_t end = (uint32_t)m_file_length;
00561     size_t start_row_length = m_start_row.length() + 1;
00562     size_t end_row_length = m_end_row.length() + 1;
00563     DynamicBuffer dbuf(7 + std::max(start_row_length, end_row_length));
00564     SerializedKey serkey;
00565     CellStoreV0::IndexMap::const_iterator iter, mid_iter, end_iter;
00566 
00567     dbuf.clear();
00568     create_key_and_append(dbuf, m_start_row.c_str());
00569     serkey.ptr = dbuf.base;
00570     iter = m_index.upper_bound(serkey);
00571     start = (*iter).second;
00572 
00573     dbuf.clear();
00574     create_key_and_append(dbuf, m_end_row.c_str());
00575     serkey.ptr = dbuf.base;
00576     if ((end_iter = m_index.lower_bound(serkey)) == m_index.end())
00577       end = m_file_length;
00578     else
00579       end = (*end_iter).second;
00580 
00581     m_disk_usage = end - start;
00582 
00583     size_t i=0;
00584     for (mid_iter=iter; iter!=end_iter; ++iter,++i) {
00585       if ((i%2)==0)
00586         ++mid_iter;
00587     }
00588     if (mid_iter != m_index.end())
00589       record_split_row((*mid_iter).first);
00590   }
00591 
00592   error = 0;
00593 
00594  abort:
00595   delete m_compressor;
00596   m_compressor = 0;
00597   delete [] m_fix_index_buffer.release();
00598   return error;
00599 }
00600 
00601 
00605 void CellStoreV0::display_block_info() {
00606   SerializedKey last_key;
00607   uint32_t last_offset = 0;
00608   uint32_t block_size;
00609   size_t i=0;
00610   for (IndexMap::const_iterator iter = m_index.begin();
00611        iter != m_index.end(); ++iter) {
00612     if (last_key) {
00613       block_size = (*iter).second - last_offset;
00614       cout << i << ": offset=" << last_offset << " size=" << block_size
00615            << " row=" << last_key.row() << endl;
00616       i++;
00617     }
00618     last_offset = (*iter).second;
00619     last_key = (*iter).first;
00620   }
00621   if (last_key) {
00622     block_size = m_trailer.filter_offset - last_offset;
00623     cout << i << ": offset=" << last_offset << " size=" << block_size
00624          << " row=" << last_key.row() << endl;
00625   }
00626 }

00628 
00629 
00630 void CellStoreV0::record_split_row(const SerializedKey key) {
00631   std::string split_row = key.row();
00632   if (split_row > m_start_row && split_row < m_end_row)
00633     m_split_row = split_row;
00634 }
